Reviews.Title: Good little phone but be mindful..
Reviews.Author: David W. Francis "David Wayne"
Reviews.Content: I've just bought this phone. And I'm not trying to take business away from Amazon, but you can get this phone at Walmart for 99 dollars. That's not a bad price for an android. It will only work on Straight Talks 45 dollar plan. So you have an android with unlimited minutes. That's a steal in itself seeing how all of these other companies work. So you have all the apps available in the app store, or for free. I haven't really tailored my phone to fit my needs but I'm getting there. You also have youtube on this phone. I listened to it and its loud, and the screen is vibrant. you can watch youtube either face up or side ways its doesn't matter. You've got the GPS Navigational system, maps, WiFi. This phone is a 3G phone so if you're looking for a 3G phone and you don't want to pay an arm and a leg this is probably right up your alley. The phone is sleek and fits snug in your hand. I can't see it being overly bulky or anything. It has a 600hz processor and comes with a 4GB memory card already installed. and its an hc memory card. That gives you 18GB you can store on your phone for pictures, and music. It has wall paper and live wall paper. Although I've been told the live wall paper will drain your battery faster so regular should work fine.I like most everything on this phone but here is a draw back. Although I wouldn't call it a major draw back. The touch screen is sensitive. Maybe a little too sensitive. I have long fingers, so that may be the case. You have to try a few times on the key pad to get what you want. Some times you have to add the word to your dictionary when typing. But it usually autocorrects, and its nice to have the word there even if you have to add it. Just remember that this thing is very sensitive, so be patient with it and take your time. If you're impatient learn to be patient, and this shouldn't be a problem. Web surfing is no problem. You have your standard stuff here. Facebook, weather, etc. Phone is fast enough for me. It has a 5 megapixel camera and video. The pictures so far are pretty good. I haven't taken any video yet but I will post a follow up once I've had the phone for a while. You guys here know I pull no punches with my reviews. So beside the touch screen being over sensitive I really like this phone so far. So we'll see where we are in a few months. But right now I'm loving it.Talk quality is really good. It's very clear without in static in the background. The charger has a plug and usb cable. you plug up the usb cable to the plug and tada. Also has an ear phone jack so you can listen to youtube or whatever else. Bluetooth capability. Do yourself a favor and check it out if you're in the market a new phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: Markiee
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone at walmart for 99 dollars. It is a great cheap android phone that works well for basic tasks like facebook,calling,texting and some lighter games. Don't expect this to run games like GTA 3 at all more like angry birds and fruit ninja casual games like that. It doesn't run flash but that's okay because you can either use the youtube app or a web browser. In My Opinion the web browser is easier for youtube than the  youtube app because in my experiences the youtube app tends to buffer for a very long time.

Reviews.Title: Huawei Ascend 2 Review
Reviews.Author: Andrea H.
Reviews.Content: I have this phone now and it sucks. It constantly freezes , complains about little storage. And the batteries are NOOOOOOOO good in these phones. I've already had to replace my phone battery and I haven't had the phone a year. I refuse to buy another battery for this raggedly piece of crap. I just bought a battery last week and already it has screwed up too. Never again will I have a straight talk phone because they suck. Oh yeah by the way the chargers to these phones are no good as well they overheat to quickly.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: D'Aune
Reviews.Content: I have this phone and my sister has the Ascend 1.  Unfortunaly both of them freeze up daily and keep telling us that we have no storage space left (and we have very few apps etc).I would not recommend an Huawei phone.  =(

Reviews.Title: DONT ORDER!!!
Reviews.Author: LEXI
Reviews.Content: I have this product right now as we speak and trust me do not waste your money on this. its really good for about 2 months then after that everything crashes. right now after 8 months of having this its on its last leg. it keeps crashing, blacking out, have to factory reset and reboot it all of the time. please dont waste your money on this. you will be pissed that you did order it.Huawei Ascend 2 Straight Talk Prepaid

Reviews.Title: Terrible phone, Not worth the cost.
Reviews.Author: Robert M. Jones
Reviews.Content: This phone is an absolute piece of crap. It endlessly freezes, I've reset it 3 times, the browser constantly crashes, it overheats, and always drops calls, additionally the signal for out of state is absolutely terrible. and I have requested a replacement, and ST won't send me a different model even though the darn thing is insured. They still want to send the same phone, even though I have explained that it sucks, and I don't want another one like it. It seams that these models were made with defects, which is why EVERYONE has problems with them. I advise against purchasing one of these. If you are planning on an android, buy a Samsung, LG, or some other brand. DO NOT BUY ONE OF THESE!  I personally will NEVER buy one, or any phone like it again. ST has good service, but not so great phones.

Reviews.Title: smartphones
Reviews.Author: jaybay
Reviews.Content: I have been through alot of phone this phone was more made for teens not everyday use Huawi it self wasn't made for that if you don't like cheap phones then don't buy them you get your money's worth is what I say and I don't think most of the problems with this phone have nothing to do with the company it's like a computer the more wear and tear the more problems you will have but I think this phone is good for what it was made for I know its not a Samsung galaxy or iPhone h.t.c or LG or a real good name brand it does its job for what it was made to do may not be the best the phones but what cheap phone is so in all in all I think it's a really good phone for a teenager

Reviews.Title: Good phone and great provider
Reviews.Author: benjamin
Reviews.Content: Bought this for the price but was pleasantly surprised by how well it performs for the price. The battery lasts all day after many months of hard use.  45 a month for truly unlimited can't beat that.  Especially with great service all around.

Reviews.Title: Yuck.  Awful.
Reviews.Author: Annie T
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for 1 year (via CRICKET) - purchased summer 2012.  It's awful.  It has no grit, no real "power".  It started defaulting to a different language when texting (predictive text) and it would default to random #'s in the texts.  Like if I wanted to say something like "meet you guys at 6:30" it would default to something like "meet you guys at 6:mnpe120ndxz230zlp63a"  Anyway, regarding it changing languages, I'd have to go back into "setting" and redirect it to English.  Over & over.  Like every 2 weeks.Cricket told me a couple of months ago that since they "updated their cell towers", this phone just can't handle the upgrade.Don't buy it.  Also, it would throw out random stuff occasionally when I needed the GPS.  It would work great about 70% of the time - the other 30% it wouldn't have a clue re: basic directions, like driving 2 blocks to a certain bank.It's a gutless phone.  It's just way too weak, in my opinion, to be of much use.  Recently went with the Samsung Galaxy S4.  A WORLD of difference, which won't surprise anyone.I wouldn't spend any time thinking about this phone as a viable option.

Reviews.Title: crap phone, good service straight talk
Reviews.Author: JaredK
Reviews.Content: I got this phone as a gift 4 months ago now and I can't wait to get a different one (its the $100 Walmart straight talk version).  Almost nothing from the Google play store works on this phone. This wouldn't be a bad phone for someone who doesn't use apps, but what is the point of having an android if you don't use apps?! The service is really good, good signal and data speed. It's just a crappy cheap phone. Save your money for a better phone, I am.

Reviews.Title: POS it will die
Reviews.Author: pod
Reviews.Content: bought the net10 model for 30 dollars at target on black Friday it has pissed me off ever since it has died it wont load and it keeps telling me that the keypad program has failed it wont start any more so i am trapped without a phone huawei should go die in a fire as far as I'm concerned.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Stevie-D
Reviews.Content: I never had an android phone but I like this one I'm finding out there is alot this phone can do. Furthermore, I got through straight talk so I get all this phone for 45 dollars a month. Its a good deal in my book. For the few people left who are not big on technology like me I suggest at least try this phone you might like it too.

Reviews.Title: Great starting smartphone!!!
Reviews.Author: J. ramirez
Reviews.Content: This phone was very easy to use and the definition is really good. It has allot of nice features , I had a sprint Hero 300 phone before and I was very pleased with this phone in comparison to the hero phone. The 5 megapixel camera took really good pictures , I wish it had a flash but other then that it is a great phone.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: SpikeDog17
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone on sale at giant eagle for $40 (first red flag right there), and not even 48 hours after activating and using my new phone the thing crashed on me and now I can't even get to my home screen. I then tried calling the company and transferring my number and service back to my old phone, and it didn't even work. This phone is HORRIBLE, slow, and I can almost guarantee it will crash on you within 2 months of getting it. Don't bother or waste your money.

Reviews.Title: straight talk phone
Reviews.Author: Yvonne K Coachman
Reviews.Content: The only thing I like about it is its a good looking phone. The service is terrible and really can't use the data because the service is so awful. Would send back if my grandson hadn't tore up the paperwork.

Reviews.Author: alfred itchcock
Reviews.Content: we havent had our phones for even a year yet and our phones keep going in an out of service... called tech support, and they're idiots. what the hell? my wife and i have the same phones...

Reviews.Title: hunkajunk phone
Reviews.Author: paul halfbreed burns
Reviews.Content: Activity dialer work at times, redials contacts on its own, slow on internet, doesn't stay connected to internet, and just a hunkajunk phone. Stay away from it. Dont waste your money.

Reviews.Title: It is not a Straight Talk phone!
Reviews.Author: Melissa Bruno
Reviews.Content: I am extremely disappointed.  I wanted to buy a Straight Talk phone because of the unlimited talk time and texts.  I bought the phone because it said it was a Straight Talk prepaid phone.  However, it turns out it is a Tracfone!  I called Tracfone and they said there is no way I can use that phone with Straight Talk!  I completely wasted my money and time!  I wish I could return it but have no idea how to do it, nor do I have time to try and figure it out.

Reviews.Title: Things Straighttalk might tell you about this phone
Reviews.Author: Taboo
Reviews.Content: I have not yet purchased this phone, but I went into Walmart with my dad who is extremely tech saavy. We were told if purchasing this phone that it would be the $45, 30 day plan. I am used to the $30 plan, but for this phone, $15 more may be worth it, also we were told that the Android phones are operated by Sprint and we were shown a map of the areas the Android phones cover. I was surprised to see that this phone along with the other android phones Straight talk offer have less coverage than the cheaper phones with $30 plans.So, basically you are paying $99.88 (at Walmart) for a possibly great phone with $15 extra each month (if you are accustomed to the $30 plan) with significantly less coverage. We were glad we went into the Walmart wireless center to compare phones before purchasing, because even the Straight talk website does not give you this information.

ProductInfo.Features:
3.5" touchscreen
5 megapixel camera/video recorder
Android 2.3
This phone will only work with the $45/30-Day Unlimited Service Plan or the $60/30-Day Unlimited International Service Plan
Includes battery, charger, 4GB microSD memory card, activation card, service guide and user manual
ProductInfo.Name: Huawei Ascend 2 Straight Talk Prepaid
